title: AndOLika vAhanE
sahitya:
AndOLika vAhanE jagatpatiyAm ambhOja nAbhan lasiccITunnu


caraNam 1    indindirangaL koticcULalum madhu tundilamAm sumamAlika yaninjum
    caraNam 2    cAntElum kankamAr kaNDu mOhattAl centAr sAyakanennu manasi dhariccum
    caraNam 3    vEdAntarttahin tatvamennum sAravEdiyatAm muninivaharamuraccum
    caraNam 4    vAsavan munpAm vAnOrashEsam vanperum lOkaika nAthaanennarinjum
    caraNam 5    bhakta janamanpinALiyAkum shrI padmanAbhanennu dhIramuraccum
